content: this is a legal case that started in the municipal court slavonski brod the court decided that the party involved in the case would be responsible for paying the costs of the procedure the case then moved to the county court varaždin for the second instance in 2010 a final resolution was made regarding a coowned real estate property the coownership between the plaintiff and the defendant was dissolved and the properties were to be sold through a public auction or another suitable method the plaintiff filed a lawsuit seeking the dissolution of the coownership while the defendant contested the registered coownership ratio the defendant filed counterclaim proceedings to determine their share of coownership the court ordered the dissolution of coownership and a civil partition sale the defendant appealed the judgment but the court found the appeal unfounded and affirmed the previous decision
